name: Inner Pain-t
description:
Enjoy if and where possible... 

Controls: 

WASD / Left Thumbstick | Move 

Mouse Move / Right Thumbstick | Look 

Space Bar / Left Face Button (e.g. X on Xbox controller) | Jump 

Left mouse button / Right Trigger | Shoot 

Right mouse button / Left Trigger | Reload 

1/ Left Bumper | Equip Pistol 

2/ Right Bumper | Equip Shotgun 

Esc / # / Right Menu Button | Open Pause Menu
